name: Her Name is Eva (Mobile Edition)
description:
!!! THIS IS THE MOBILE EDITION!!!

If you're playing on Desktop, check the Desktop version!

A small rpg type game. Your purpose is to find food for a little baby dragon and feed it, exploring the map! If the game will be well received there might be future updates and new things to do and explore!

We made this game as a present for our programmer's, Anastasia, little sister, Eva! who just turned 7 and loves dragons!

The music is 100% ours but is meant for another project, so it may be replaced in future ubdates, if there will be any!

Also, i am aware of the music glitching and the pc sometimes dissapearing, no idea why that happens? It's not a problem that i have encountered in the engine, only in the html
